data.question: What is the color of the compound Cu(pz)2·H2O?
What is the reaction time required to synthesize Cu(pz)2·H2O?
Is the compound Cu(pz)2·MeNH2 blue in color?
What is the space group of α-Cu(pz)2?
Does the compound β-Cu(pz)2 exhibit a beige color?
What is the effect of gentle heating on Cu(pz)2·H2O?
data.answer: It loses water and forms a new beige Cu(pz)2 species (β-phase).

data.question: Can Cu(pz)2·MeCN be synthesized directly from copper acetate and pyrazole MeCN solutions?
What is the magnetic susceptibility of [Cu(pz)2].NH3 at room temperature?
Is the compound Cu(pz)2·MeOH stable in air at room temperature?
What happens to β-Cu(pz)2 when exposed to vapors of NH3, MeNH2, CH3CN, pyridine, MeOH, or EtOH?
Does the compound α-Ni(pz)2 have a yellow color?
What is the space group of the compound β-Ni(pz)2?
What is the color of the compound Cu(pz)2·EtOH?
Can Cu(pz)2·MeCN easily restore β-Cu(pz)2 upon vacuum pumping or gentle heating?
What is the crystal packing motif of Cu(pz)2·H2O?
Is the compound Cu(pz)2·pyridine blue in color?
What is the reaction time for the synthesis of Cu(pz)2·NH3?
Does the presence of water molecules influence the spectroscopic properties of Cu(pz)2·H2O?
What is the effect of exposing β-Cu(pz)2 to moisture?
data.answer: It restores the polycrystalline hydrated phase.

data.question: Are the compounds Cu(pz)2·MeOH and Cu(pz)2·EtOH isostructural?
